com.hbm.devices.scan.announce

Class DeviceMonitor

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.Observable
      • com.hbm.devices.scan.announce.DeviceMonitor
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Closeable, AutoCloseable, Observer

    public final class DeviceMonitor
extends Observable
implements Observer, Closeable
    This class provides the concept of posting new/lost device events.

    The class getsAnnounce objects via the Observer.update(java.util.Observable, java.lang.Object) method and notifies a NewDeviceEvent if the Announce object wasn't known upto now. Furthermore, it notifies a LostDeviceEvent if no new Announce object was received during the expiration period of the enclosed Announce object.

    Since:
    1.0
